result.reason: Feature request for ping-based host status monitoring in connection tree, already labeled 'Not Planned' by upstream maintainers due to excessive network traffic concerns for large connection lists — dedicated monitoring tools (Grafana, openITCOCKPIT) are more appropriate
result.approach: No implementation needed — upstream maintainers and contributors agree this generates redundant network traffic and is better served by dedicated monitoring tools

attempts.raw_output:
The issue is a feature request asking for host status indicators (online/offline) in the connection tree, showing ping-based status for all hosts in expanded folders. A contributor already flagged this as problematic due to network traffic concerns for large connection lists. It's also labeled "Not Planned" by the upstream maintainers.
